title: Why try Harry’s?
bulletPoints: Our razors are designed to deliver a close, comfortable shave
By owning our factory, we cut out the middleman and sell direct to you. The result: high-quality blades at honest and fair prices, all year round
We’ve created the Harry’s Trial Set offer to make it easy and risk-free to try our products, because we know that switching to a new razor can feel daunting

Your Shave Plan is always customised to your needs - it’s easy to pause, modify, or cancel at anytime with just a few clicks (and our full product range is always available to buy as one-off purchases on our website)
